original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpenti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyaḥ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham sikkhamānam saṅghena asammatam vuṭṭhāpenti

original: “etha, sikkhamānā, imaṁ jānātha, imaṁ detha, imaṁ āharatha, iminā attho, imaṁ kappiyaṁ karothā”ti.
analyzed: etha sikkhamānāḥ imam jānātha imam detha imam āharatha iminā atthaḥ imam kappiyam karotha ati

original: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: yāḥ tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ appicchāḥ pe tāḥ ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti …pe…
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhuniyaḥ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham sikkhamānam saṅghena asammatam vuṭṭhāpessanti iti pe

original: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham sikkhamānam saṅghena asammatam vuṭṭhāpenti iti

original: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpessanti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham sikkhamānam saṅghena asammatam vuṭṭhāpessanti
na ita bhikkhave appasannānam vā pasādāya pe

original: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ dātuṁ.
analyzed: anujānāmi bhikkhave dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhāna sammutim dātu

original: Tāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya saṅghaṁ upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: tāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya sikkhamānāya saṅgham upasaṅkamitvā

original: ekaṁsaṁ uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṁ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṁ nisīditvā añjaliṁ
analyzed: ekasam uttarāsaṅgam karitvā bhikkhunīnam pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikam nisīditvā añjali

original: ‘ahaṁ, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṅghaṁ vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ yācāmī’ti.
analyzed: aha ayye itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhā sikkhamānā saṅgham vuṭṭhāna sammutim yācāmi iti

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṅghaṁ vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ yācati.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhā sikkhamānā saṅgham vuṭṭhāna sammutim yācati

original: Yadi saṅghassa pattakallaṁ, saṅgho itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ dadeyya.
analyzed: yadi saṅghassa pattakalla saṅghaḥ itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhāna sammutim dadeyya

original: Ayaṁ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṅghaṁ vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ yācati.
analyzed: ayam itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhā sikkhamānā saṅgham vuṭṭhāna sammutim yācati

original: Saṅgho itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṁ deti.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhāna sammutim deti

original: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiyā dānaṁ, sā tuṇhassa;
analyzed: yassa ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhāna sammutiyā sā tuṇhassa

original: Dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammuti;
analyzed: dinnā saṅghena itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhāna sammuti

original: khamati saṅghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṁ dhārayāmī’”ti.
analyzed: khamati saṅghassa tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā tāḥ bhikkhuniyaḥ aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbhara tāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave bhikkhuniyaḥ imam sikkhāpadam uddisantu

original: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ saṅghena asammataṁ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
analyzed: yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham sikkhamānam saṅghena a sammatam vuṭṭhāpeyya pācittiyan ti
pe ayam imasmin atthe adhippetā bhikkhunī iti

original: ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti.
analyzed: ñatti dutiyena kammena vuṭṭhāna sammuti na dinnā hoti

original: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṁ vā ācariniṁ vā pattaṁ vā cīvaraṁ vā pariyesati, sīmaṁ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: vuṭṭhāpessāmi iti gaṇam vā ācarinim vā pattam vā cīvaram vā pariyesati sīmam vā sammannati āpatti dukkaṭassa
kamma vācā pariyosāne upajjhāyāya āpatti pācittiyassa

original: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
analyzed: gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa
dhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā vuṭṭhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
dhamma kamme vematikāḥ vuṭṭhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
dhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā vuṭṭhāpeti āpatti pācittiyassa
adhamma kamme dhamma kamma saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa
adhamma kamme adhamma kamma saññā āpatti dukkaṭassa

original: dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṁ sikkhamānaṁ saṅghena sammataṁ vuṭṭhāpeti,
analyzed: dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhita sikkham sikkhamānam saṅghena sammatam vuṭṭhāpeti
